description: Enterprise techniques used by Hacking Team UEFI Rootkit, ATT&CK software S0047 (v1.1)
name: Hacking Team UEFI Rootkit (S0047)

techniques.comment: [Hacking Team UEFI Rootkit](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0047) is a UEFI BIOS rootkit developed by the company Hacking Team to persist remote access software on some targeted systems.(Citation: TrendMicro Hacking Team UEFI)
